_header: Lord Jesu Christ in Trinity / Three persons in unity
Note: For other texts which lack the Prologue see 1909.
_description: ‘The Stacions of Rome’, in couplets, with a Prologue of 78 lines

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
LOrd Ihesu crist In TriniteÞreo persones In
                    vnite…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Graunt vs part of þis pardounAnd þerto his
                    Benisoun. Amen.
